markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Certain Kill](/Traits.aspx?ID=384)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 51

This trait is from the _Fists of the Ruby Phoenix_ Adventure Path and is closely tied to a specific location visited during the adventure. Only one Certain Kill Art can be used in a given round.
name: Certain Kill
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 51
